title: Abakainon
description: A city of the Siculi on the northern coast of Sicily.

properties.description: Ruins near the city of Tripi that have been associated with the ancient settlement of Abacaenum. Location based on a representative point derived from an OpenStreetMap node.
properties.title: OSM location of archaeological site of Abacaenum

properties.description: Location of the modern city of Tripi, thought to be in the area of the ancient settlement of Abakainon, based on a representative point derived from an OpenStreetMap  node.
properties.title: OSM location of Tripi
